description.overview: Growth represents your external expansion - opportunities, career momentum, personal evolution, and social connections.
description.detailed: This group combines four growth dimensions: Momentum (favorable timing and doors opening), Ambition (professional momentum and recognition), Evolution (personal evolution and life transitions), and Circle (friendships and community connections). Together they show your overall external growth and expansion. High scores mean doors are opening, career is flowing, you're evolving naturally, and social connections feel easy. Low scores suggest closed doors, career obstacles, resistance to change, or social isolation.

quiet.challenging: Doors feel closed right now - use this time to build your foundation. When they open, you'll be ready
quiet.mixed: External momentum is low - quiet preparation is still progress. You're loading the spring
quiet.harmonious: Peaceful stability - rest now. The next growth phase is coming and you'll want the reserves

mild.challenging: Progress is slow - frustrating but not stuck. Small steps compound. Keep moving
mild.mixed: Gentle shifts in multiple directions - some doors opening, some closing. Both are making room
mild.harmonious: Easy progress flowing - opportunities are finding you. Stay open and follow up

moderate.challenging: Growth requires real effort right now - obstacles are there but so is your ability to push through them
moderate.mixed: Progress and setbacks happening together - that's normal growth. Focus on what's working
moderate.harmonious: Natural expansion across the board - career, opportunities, connections all flowing. Lean in

high.challenging: Intense pressure to evolve - it's a lot, but pressure creates diamonds. You're becoming something new
high.mixed: Rapid change everywhere, exciting and overwhelming - you can handle the chaos. Pick your priorities
high.harmonious: Strong momentum across all growth areas - doors are opening fast. Walk through them

extreme.challenging: Major transformation happening - this is hard but you're not breaking, you're being forged
extreme.mixed: Total upheaval - expansion and chaos at once. Stay grounded in who you are while everything shifts
extreme.harmonious: Peak expansion - exceptional opportunities and recognition. This is your moment. Claim it
